Conjuration 3

Heavenly Rivers

EA T'ien Ch'i

Ritual
W1S1
spell id [id]: 416
effect number [effect_number]: 1

Summon Units:#904 Demon of Heavenly Rivers x 3
The Demon of Heavenly Rivers is a violent Celestial being sprung from heavenly rivers. It has the appearance of a furious blue-skinned ogre with wild red hair. The demon is armed with a great club and wears an enchanted necklace made from the skulls of men unfortunate enough to try to cross a river guarded by the demon. Demons of Heavenly Rivers are sacred and amphibious.
